title: Cheryl Mills Called Benghazi Dead ‘Idiot Soldiers’ in Leaked E-Mail
subtitle: There is no leaked e-mail in which longtime Clinton aide Cheryl Mills called the Benghazi dead "idiot soldiers" and expressed that she was glad they were tortured.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: A leaked e-mail revealed Clinton aide Cheryl Mills calling the men who died in Benghazi "idiot soldiers" and saying she was glad they were tortured.
